definitions.title: User Authentication Validation
definitions.description: Verify user can successfully authenticate with the VRP system
acceptance_criteria: User can log in with valid credentials
User authentication state is properly managed
User is redirected to login page after logout

definitions.title: Session Management Validation
acceptance_criteria: Initial state shows user logged out

definitions.title: User Interface Interaction
definitions.description: Verify UI components respond correctly to user actions
acceptance_criteria: Visual feedback is provided for actions
